markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ceremony of Growth](/Feats.aspx?ID=2788) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conrasu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=343" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can alter your exoskeleton's size. You constantly gain the effects of [_enlarge_](/Spells.aspx?ID=102). You can dismiss or resume these effects as an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.
name: Ceremony of Growth
